subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Michigan State Coach Tom Izzo, securing his fifth Final Four appearance in 11 years, may be the good-guy foil to Connecticut’s embattled Jim Calhoun.
snippet: Michigan State Coach Tom Izzo, securing his fifth Final Four appearance in 11 years, may be the good-guy foil to Connecticut’s embattled Jim Calhoun.
